## Table with larger colspan

+------------------+
| ABC0 (colspan=3) |
+---------+--------+
| A1      | B1     |
+---------+--------+
| A2      | B2     |
+---------+--------+

## Table with unbalanced rows

+------------------+----+
| ABC0 (colspan=3) |    |
+-----+------+-----+----+
| A1  | B1   |     |    |
+-----+------+-----+----+
| A2  | B2   |     |    |
+-----+------+-----+----+
| A3  | B3   | C3  |    |
+-----+------+-----+----+
| A4  | B4   |     |    |
+-----+------+-----+----+
| A5  | B5   | C5  | D5 |
+-----+------+-----+----+
| A6  | B6   |     |    |
+-----+------+-----+----+
